channel.title: Cheng-Kai Shiau | Bioit Station (BITS) | Academia Sinica

item.title: Genome-wide identification of associations between enhancer and alternative splicing in human and mouse
TFAS
item.description: Alternative splicing (AS), the selective removal of exons and reconnection of exons by multiple processes, shapes how genetic information controls important cellular functions in different tissues of higher metazoans. In this project, we would like to investigate the association between AS and chromatin accessibility of promoter bound by different TFs genome-widely.

item.title: CATANA: a tool for generating comprehensive annotations of alternative transcript events
